tests.name: Check database exists
tests.run: sqlcmd -S 127.0.0.1 -U SA -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "SELECT NAME FROM sys.sysdatabases"

tests.name: Check customer table exists
tests.run: sqlcmd -S 127.0.0.1 -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM SimpleDB.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE'"

tests.name: Check customer ID exists in customers table
tests.run: sqlcmd -S 127.0.0.1 -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "USE SimpleDB SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'customers' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='dbo'"

tests.name: Check customer ID data type
tests.run: sqlcmd -S 127.0.0.1 -U sa -P Pa\$\$w0rd1234 -Q "USE SimpleDB SELECT DATA_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'customers' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'customerId'"
